question: pls confirm if these are Ayaats of Quran mentioned in your answer to #11618 ? I have a hard copy of MANZIL & that stipulates slighty different Aayaats of Quran e Kareem
answer:
QUESTION
I was concerned since I have a hard copy of MANZIL [ printed in Pakistan ] & that stipulates slighty different Aayaats of Quran e Kareem. Please confirm. Sura 1 - Sura 2 Ayat 1-4; Ayat 163 & 164; Ayat 255; Ayat 284-286; - Sura 3 - Ayat 18 - Sura 7 - Ayat 54 - Sura 23- Ayat 117 - Sura 72 - Ayat 3 - Sura 37 - Ayat 1-10 - Sura 59 - Ayat 22-24 - Sura 112-114 Also, should Bismillah hi Rahman Ar Raheem be recited whilst skipping between Aayats and between Surahs, whilst reading MANZIL or otherwise?
ANSWER


Share:

You may follow the copy of Manzil in your possession as is.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
